title: studio,1,2,3 Bedrooms available FOR RENT
posting_body: ['WE HAVE BEAUTIFUL AND RENOVATED APARTMENTS FOR RENT ON BEDFORD PARK, GRAND CONCOURSE, MOSHOLU PKWY, UNIVERSITY HTS, KINGSBRIDGE HTS, GUN HILL, MORRIS HTS, PELHAM PKWY, MORRIS PARK AND OTHER AREAS.', 'THESES APARTMENTS FEATURE HARDWOOD FLOORS, SECURITY CAMERA, LAUNDRY, RENOVATED KITCHEN AND BATHROOM, ELEVATOR BUILDING, CLOSE TO TRANSPORTATION AND SHOPPING CENTER.', 'STUDIO APARTMENT:', 'MARION AVENUE- $1495', '1BEDROOMS:', 'GRAND CONCOURSE AVE FOR $1895', 'SHERIDAN AVENUE - $1695', 'UNIVERSITY AVE  AND 183 -$1812', 'CLAY AVENUE- $1725', '520EAST 138TH - $1525', 'ANTHONY AVE - $1650', 'GRAND CON. - $1695', 'RYER AVENUE - $1695', 'DAVIDSON AVENUE - $1695', 'TELLER AVE  - $1650', 'BAINBRIDGE - $1750', 'GRAND CONCORSE - 1895', 'HOLLAND AVE -$1795', 'DECATUR AVE $1895', '2BEDROOM', 'GRAND CON-$2195', 'MORRIS AVE $2395', 'GRAND CONCOURSE-$2295', '182 ST$2195', 'SHERMAN AVE, MANHATTAN $1695', 'BRUCKNER BLVD $1950', 'BATHGATE AVE - $2044', 'HULL AVENUE $1948', 'UNION AVE $2295', 'STUEBEN AVENUE $1824', '304 E 209 ST $1650', '1800 MOHEGAN AVE $1500', '3BR APARTMENT', 'SHERMAN AVE, MANHATTAN $2195', 'DECATUR AVE $$2795', 'FOR MORE INFORMATION CALL OR TEXT AT 929 370-8144 or 347 7724285']
